summary: Internet Computer dapp template initialized: Motoko backend with authorization + blob storage, and a React (Vite) frontend implementing Internet Identity login, user profile setup, and a basic Manga library UI with cover image upload and pagination.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication (login/logout)
existing_features.description: Frontend integrates Internet Identity for user sign-in/sign-out and actor initialization for authenticated calls.

existing_features.title: User profile setup and current-user profile retrieval
existing_features.description: UI dialog for initial profile setup and hooks/utilities to fetch/use the current user's profile.

existing_features.title: Manga library CRUD UI (create + list)
existing_features.description: Frontend pages/components to add manga entries and display a list of manga cards.

existing_features.title: Cover image upload + storage integration
existing_features.description: Cover image field and storage client wiring to upload/store cover images via blob-storage canister/module.

existing_features.title: Pagination controls for manga listing
existing_features.description: Pagination controls and hooks for fetching manga pages and navigating results.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend authorization module and access control
existing_features.description: Backend includes reusable authorization/access-control modules used to gate operations.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for IC (backend + frontend)
existing_features.description: Repository includes build-template assets (Dockerfile, scripts, canister.yaml, configs) for building and deploying the full-stack app.

existing_features.title: Fix the Add Manga dialog layout so the primary submit button remains reliably clickable after entering metadata (no overlapping/hidden layers blocking pointer events). Update the dialogâ€™s internal layout to use a stable flex column structure (header + scrollable body + footer) where only the form body scrolls and the footer remains fully interactive.

Eliminate the user-visible warning/error condition "Actor not available" during Add Manga by preventing submission until the backend actor is ready and providing clear, English UI feedback when the actor is still initializing. Ensure the Add Manga submit button and mutation cannot run while the actor is null/initializing.

architectural_notes: Backend is implemented in Motoko with modular authorization (MixinAuthorization/access-control) and blob storage (Mixin/Storage).
Frontend is a React + Vite + Tailwind app using shadcn/ui component library.
Frontend uses generated canister bindings (backend.did) and an actor hook pattern (useActor/useInternetIdentity) for authenticated calls.
Assets include generated placeholders (app logo and cover placeholder) produced by build-template image scripts.
Authorization and blob-storage Motoko modules updated/aligned to component versions v4.0.0 (internal refactors/updates across backend main + mixins).
Build-template refreshed (Dockerfile/scripts/workspace configs) and frontend template dependencies/configs updated (React+Vite+Tailwind+shadcn/ui template sync).
known_issues: Add Manga button becomes non-clickable/"floaty" after entering metadata, suggesting overlapping UI elements blocking interaction.
Warning shown: "actor not available" (frontend actor initialization/auth state issue), preventing Add Manga from executing.
